si.title: කවුද නොදැවී කවුද?
body_lines: ජනාධිපතිවරණයේදී සුමන්තිරාන්ගේ ක්රීඩාව පාර්ලිමේන්තු මැතිවරණය අවසානයේදී ඕනෑම බිඳ වැටීමක් ඇති කරයි.

en.title: Who's going to be unbeaten?
body_lines: Sumanthiran's game in the presidential election may make any twists at the end of the parliamentary election.

summary_lines: Sumanthiran's presidential campaign could impact the outcome of the parliamentary election, potentially leading to unexpected results. His performance may influence voter decisions and sway the final tally.
